AboutUs.Description1: The LotsenApp was the implementation of the digital patient file from the STROKE OWL project. The aim of the digital patient file was the structured collection of study and process data for the care of patients, for the implementation of the study, and for the provision of data for health insurance companies and billing service providers.
AboutUs.Description2: With version 2 of the LotsenApp, the application has been further developed so that it can be used generally as a study tool or as a tool with similar and partly more stringent technical safety concepts and can be used beyond the specific use case "stroke".
AboutUs.Description3-1: The LotsenApp is being developed by the "Data Management and Analysis for Health Services Research" group of the
AboutUs.Description3-2: , as well as the contributors of the open source community.
AboutUs.Title: About

FieldEditor.AddToParticipantHeaderTooltip: One may search for this value in the participant overview. The value will only be added for this participant.

FieldEditor.RemoveFromProjectHeader: Do not search for this value for all project participants
FieldEditor.RemoveFromParticipantHeaderTooltip: One may no longer search for this value in the participant overview. The value will only be removed for this participant.
FieldEditor.RemoveFromProjectHeaderTooltip: One may no longer search for this value in the participant overview. The entry will be removed for all participants of the project.

Hint.Hint1: The data password is used to encrypt the captured data. The app does
Hint.Hint2: store the password. If the password is lost, then the data may be decrypted by using the recovery key. The recovery key will be displayed once in this screen and will not be saved. If the data password and recovery key are lost, then the data can
Hint.Hint4: Using the 'Save'-Button allows you to save the recovery key in a file. You may also change the recovery key using the input field. If the recovery key is saved, then it should be saved to an external drive or be encrypted. Otherwise unauthorized access of the data may be possible.

Hints.Error: The data password could not be saved

Hints.RepeatRequired: The repetition of the data password is

DataPassword.SaveKeys: Save data password and recovery key

Errors.PasswordSetFailed: The password could not be set. Please choose another password.

PasswordSet.Hint: The local account is not protected by a password. Please set a password.

Hints.NotEqual: The passwords are not the same
Hints.PasswordDigit: The password must contain a number
Hints.PasswordLength: The password must consist of at least 6 characters
Hints.PasswordLowerCase: The password must contain a lowercase letter
Hints.PasswordNonAlphaNumeric: The password must contain a non-alphanumeric character
Hints.PasswordUpperCase: The password must contain a capital letter

PasswordSet.Protected: The account is protected by a password.

TanList.Acknowledge: I have taken note of the notice.
TanList.Created: The TAN list has been generated
TanList.Hint: The TAN list is required as additional protection for some operations such as resetting the account password and should
TanList.Hint2: be stored unencrypted on the same devices for security purposes. The file should be stored on an encrypted USB stick or in a password safe.
